name: Don't Let Them IN (anjithkrish89)
description:
The player is overwhelmed by some unknown entities and should analyze the area to figure out a way to clear the level. The main objective is to defeat the boss, who is hiding in plain sight. You have to use your instinct to find a way around this. Limit the maximum number of enemies within your perimeter to 5, or else..

TIP: Light is your ally.
